Package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces

Interfaces used in simulation among models and engines.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventsExchangingI
    The interface EventsExchangingI defines the method used to propagate events among models and simulation engines in a DEVS simulation.
    MessageLoggingI
    The interface MessageLogging defines basic logging services for DEVS simulation models.
    ModelDescriptionI
    The interface ModelDescriptionI defines the methods that can be used to get information from simulation models directly or through their simulation engine or any other proxy reference.
    ParentNotificationI
    The interface ParentNotificationI defines the methods used by child models to notify their parent models about the processing of external events.
    SimulationReportI
    The interface SimulationReportI can be used to type classes representing results of simulation to be returned after simulation runs.
    VariablesSharingI
    The interface VariablesSharingI defines methods related to the sharing of variables among HIOA models.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces Description

Interfaces used in simulation among models and engines.

This package defines interfaces that express behaviour placed between models of simulation engines thus exposing their mutual engagements for implementing the required operations.
